# imageExportPreset

**Instance Property**

The preset to use when preparing images for export to your app.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var imageExportPreset: UIImagePickerController.ImageURLExportPreset { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIImagePickerController/ImageURLExportPreset/compatible].

## Configuring the export presets

- **UIImagePickerController.ImageURLExportPreset**: Constants that indicate how to export images to the client app.
- **videoExportPreset**: The preset to use when preparing video for export to your app.
